title: DNA Sequence Visualization
text: DNAplot package provides simple customizable function create aesthetically pleasing plots DNA sequences. base represented colored rectangle, allowing easy visualization analysis sequence features.

title: DNA Sequence Visualization
text: can install development version DNAplot GitHub :

title: DNA Sequence Visualization
text: Just write sequence plot !  can also plot undefined bases
code: library(DNAplot) sequence <- "ACTGAAGTA"  plot_dna(sequence) #> ℹ Plotting 9 bases sequence <- "ACYGARGTA"  plot_dna(sequence) #> ℹ Plotting 9 bases

title: Plot DNA sequence — plot_dna
text: Creates plot DNA sequence, base represented colored rectangle.

title: Plot DNA sequence — plot_dna
text: seq character string representing DNA sequence.

title: Plot DNA sequence — plot_dna
text: ggplot2 object representing DNA sequence plot.
